title: The structural design of foundations, elements made of masonry, timber, plain concrete, reinforced concrete, pre-stressed concrete and structural steel shall conform to the provisions of Part VI Structural Design Section1- Loads, Section 2-Foundation, Section 3-Wood, Section 4-Masonry, Section5-Concrete, Section 6-Steel, National Building Code of India and as per relevant I S code
clause_text: The structural design of foundations, elements made of masonry, timber, plain concrete, reinforced concrete, pre-stressed concrete and structural steel shall conform to the provisions of Part VI Structural Design Section1- Loads, Section 2-Foundation, Section 3-Wood, Section 4-Masonry, Section5-Concrete, Section 6-Steel, National Building Code of India and as per relevant I S code.
